keyPolicies.policyDescription: Backing Ruth will mean more police officers keeping Nottinghamshire safe and she will work with the Chief Constable to fight for Rushcliffe’s local policing needs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fight for New Local Health Centres
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ruth will campaign for Government funding to build new local health centres to meet increasing demand across our area.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect Our Environment and Reduce Waste
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Building on Rushcliffe’s award winning recycling services, Ruth will explore ways to reduce plastic, our carbon footprint, and include glass in our local recycling collection services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Local Per Pupil School Funding Increases
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Backing Ruth will lock in increased spending per pupil in our local schools, and ensure we have the best local schools for local children.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Grow Our Local Economy With Well Paid Jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ruth will work with local Councils to encourage investment and well-paid jobs into our area. For example, campaigning for an Enterprise Zone around the Ratcliffe-on-Soar Power Station site to bring in high-tech and green industry.

mentions.tacticalSituation: After 49 years representing Rushcliffe, Ken Clarke has decided to retire and Ruth Edwards has been selected as the new Conservative MP candidate for Rushcliffe.

issues.economy: Grow Our Local Economy With Well Paid Jobs: Ruth will work with local Councils to encourage investment and well-paid jobs into our area. For example, campaigning for an Enterprise Zone around the Ratcliffe-on-Soar Power Station site to bring in high-tech and green industry.
issues.education: Local Per Pupil School Funding Increases: Backing Ruth will lock in increased spending per pupil in our local schools, and ensure we have the best local schools for local children.
issues.environment: Protect Our Environment and Reduce Waste: Building on Rushcliffe’s award winning recycling services, Ruth will explore ways to reduce plastic, our carbon footprint, and include glass in our local recycling collection services.
issues.health: Fight for New Local Health Centres: Ruth will campaign for Government funding to build new local health centres to meet increasing demand across our area.
issues.lawCrime: More Policing For Our Area: Backing Ruth will mean more police officers keeping Nottinghamshire safe and she will work with the Chief Constable to fight for Rushcliffe’s local policing needs.

community.content: Ruth's Plan for Rushcliffe includes local issues like more policing, new health centres, protecting the environment, school funding, and growing the local economy.

contactInformation.address: Rushcliffe House, 17-19 Rectory Road, West Bridgford, Nottingham, NG2 6BE

examples: Backing Ruth will mean more police officers keeping Nottinghamshire safe and she will work with the Chief Constable to fight for Rushcliffe’s local policing needs.
Ruth will campaign for Government funding to build new local health centres to meet increasing demand across our area.
Building on Rushcliffe’s award winning recycling services, Ruth will explore ways to reduce plastic, our carbon footprint, and include glass in our local recycling collection services.
Backing Ruth will lock in increased spending per pupil in our local schools, and ensure we have the best local schools for local children.
Ruth will work with local Councils to encourage investment and well-paid jobs into our area.
For example, campaigning for an Enterprise Zone around the Ratcliffe-on-Soar Power Station site to bring in high-tech and green industry.
After 49 years representing Rushcliffe, Ken Clarke has decided to retire and Ruth Edwards has been selected as the new Conservative MP candidate for Rushcliffe.
Ruth's Plan for Rushcliffe includes local issues like more policing, new health centres, protecting the environment, school funding, and growing the local economy.
